name: Apptunix
description:
Apptunix is a top rated web/mobile app development company. Founded by a young and energetic entrepreneur, Apptunix is a perfect blend of knowledge with innovation. Be it Startup app or an enterprise application, Apptunix is an ideal technology partner to turn your ideas into a reality.
Established in mid-2013 and since then engaged in elevating the client’s interests & satisfaction through innovative Web & Mobility solutions. Holding powerful strength of in-house veterans of 50+ who work closely & dedicatedly with the clients to cater fully customized web/mobile solutions to them.Our Services:Native Apps development (iOS/Android/Windows)Cross-Platform Apps development (Xamarin/Titanium/PhoneGap)Games Development (Unity3D/Cocos2D)Web development (PHP, WordPress, Magento, Joomla)Web Designing (Graphics, UI, Illustration, Photoshop)
Our Tech Stack: 
WEB-DEVELOPMENT:  React JS | Node JS | Redux| Relay| Jest | JavaScript | PHP(Frameworks & CMS)
MOBILE DEVELOPMENT: Ionic v1,v2,v3 | Angular v2,v4, v5,v6 | TypeScript |Mobile UI and UX | firestore| React Native | Appcelerator Titanium | Android |  iOS
ENTERPRISE APP DEVELOPMENT: Scala | Java | Kafka | Apache Spark | Akka | Hadoop | Play | Springs MVC
DEVOPS: Dockers | Containers | Kubernetes | AWS | Terraform | Ansible
BIG DATA: Python | GoLang | ErLang | Elixir | Tensor  Flow | Phoenix
READ MORE...
